mapper.select: SELECT t.*,ta1.AREA_NAME AS province_name, ta2.AREA_NAME AS city_name, ta3.AREA_NAME AS area_name, login.account,login.pwd,login.head_img,login.annex_url,login.people_type,p.permission,p.user_type,login.status AS edit_status FROM user_base_info t LEFT JOIN user_login_info login ON login.user_id = t.id LEFT JOIN permission_info p ON p.user_id = t.id LEFT JOIN traffic_area ta1 ON ta1.AREA_NO = t.province LEFT JOIN traffic_area ta2 ON ta2.AREA_NO = t.city LEFT JOIN traffic_area ta3 ON ta3.AREA_NO = t.area WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_base_info SET real_name = #{realName}, id_card = #{idCard}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, education = #{education}, work_unit = #{workUnit}, post_code = #{postCode}, fixed_telephone = #{fixedTelephone}, position = #{position}, work_number = #{workNumber}, people_type1 = #{peopleType1}, people_type2 = #{peopleType2}, people_type3 = #{peopleType3}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_username = #{updateUsername} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE user_base_info SET status=#{status} WHERE id = #{id}
